title: I’m Not Going to Be Bullied By a Girl - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Ecchi   Harem   Martial Arts   Romance   School Life   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Beautiful Female Lead   Character Growth   Childhood Friends   Childhood Love   Delinquents   Dense Protagonist   Different Social Status   Familial Love   Family Conflict   Friendship   Loli   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Loyal Subordinates   Male Protagonist   Manipulative Characters   Master-Servant Relationship   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Mysterious Family Background   Nationalism   Nudity   Obsessive Love   Perverted Protagonist   Pragmatic Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Racism   Rivalry   Servants   Siblings   Store Owner   Tragic Past   Trap   Yandere   Younger Sisters

description:
What the hell? That menace who bullied me since I was six years old, actually became a pretty girl after three years of living apart? And she even ran to our agreed duel location to confess to me, hoping that I can become her boyfriend?!

This is a plot against me! There’s definitely an enormous conspiracy behind this! I won’t be fooled by you! Even if you tear up and act all pitiful, I will still disregard you and humiliate you, until you've have completely paid back all my childhood grievances!

What’cha lookin’at? There are very reasonable grounds for bullying a girl!>
